properties.address: Barnstaple Library, Barnstaple, Devon EX31 1EL EX31 1EL
properties.description: Barnstaple Library is open six days a week and is fully accessible. Aside from a wide range of fiction and non-fiction books, we offer free Wi-Fi, public access computers, printing, newspapers and a varied programme of events. From October to March people can help themselves to a warm coat from our rail. From November to end of March 2025 free soup and bread served Wednesdays in the foyer from 12pm, whilst stocks last. Everyone welcome. There are plenty of comfortable, cosy corners for sitting, reading or studying along with charging points. For more information about resources at the library follow this link: https://discover.librariesunlimited.org.uk/-/barnstaple-library#/
properties.title: Barnstaple Library

properties.address: Bideford Library and Learn Devon, Bideford, Devon EX39 2EY
properties.description: Chatty Cafe every Thursday from 12 - 1.30pm in the Juniper room (first floor of the library building). Free refreshments and soup. A chance to meet new people and learn about what is happening locally.
properties.title: Bideford Library
Braunton Foodbank and Cafe at South Street Church

properties.address: Christ Church, Chaloners Road, Braunton, Devon EX33 2ES
properties.description: Open to everyone in the community
properties.title: Community Cafe

properties.address: Lavington United Reformed Church, Devon EX39 2QE
properties.description: A cafe for the community, run by volunteers from the local church, providing hot and cold meals and hot drinks. Open every Tuesday from 10:00am until 1:00pm.
properties.title: Lavington's Tuesday Cafe

properties.address: The Foyer @ Barnstaple Library, Barnstaple, Devon EX31 1EL
properties.description: Pop along between 10am and 12 noon for a cuppa with fellow community members. Local Community Groups, Services and Organisations join us with advice, information and activities which support health, wellbeing, connection and community. The main Barnstaple Library is also open whilst this sessions is running, in fact they're open 6 days a week (check their website for more details).
properties.title: Wellbeing Wednesday Cafe
